---
title: "ElementType"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

The innermost datatype of an image.

How individual color components are encoded.

## Variants

* U8
* U16
* U32
* U64
* I8
* I16
* I32
* I64
* F16
* F32
* F64
